snippet: The rebel group issued a statement from the site of the negotiations calling the general and two others seized with him “enemy military personnel.”
abstract: Colombian forces scour country's northwestern region for Gen Ruben Dario Alzate, who was captured by guerrillas; incident has threatened to upend peace talks meant to end 50-year insurgency by the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia.
lead_paragraph: The rebel group issued a statement from the site of the negotiations calling the general and two others seized with him “enemy military personnel.”

headline.main: Colombian Forces Search for General Seized by Rebels
headline.print_headline: Colombian Forces Search for General Seized by Rebels
